entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
